name: Cave Climb
description:
This is my second game in my one week game series.

Fell down again? Don't give up climber!

In this game you will use your rope to tether yourself to blocks, and use momentum to swing climb up. You can only tether to blocks close enough to you.

There are 5 biomes, each introducing a new block type and enemy. Each biome has a distinct feel, with it's own music too.

The player has access to bombs and a boomerang as well. The bomb will clear your path of blocks and enemies, while the boomerang gives you some range to fend off the creatures of the cave.

If you enjoyed the game, then consider following my instagram here Nate Whitehead (@1weekgames) • Instagram photos and videos or my youtube channel here 1 Week Games - YouTube
